title: Crypto Now Accounts For Most Of Donald Trump’s Net Worth
description: Over nearly 50 years, the president built a $2.5 billion real-estate empire. Then, in less than five years, he created a crypto kingdom worth even more.
content: Donald Trump was a real estate developer, then a TV character, then a social-media mogul. Now, hes a crypto kingpin. A majority of his fortune, an estimated $3.3 billion of his total $5.5 billion, li… [+3735 chars]
